context.p: On the View subscription page, you can view the details of subscriptions customers have created for services you offer. As a supplier, you can also view the details of subscriptions that customers of broker organizations have created for your services.
The following information on a subscription is available:

li.ph: Activation date and number of users assigned to the subscription.
Details of the marketable service to which the customer subscribed.
Details of the underlying technical service.
Details of the price model defined for the marketable service.

context.p: To view the details of a subscription:

step.cmd: In the list in the upper page area, select the subscription for which to view the details.

info.p: You can select any subscription of your customers that is currently active. If you are logged in as a supplier, you can also select an active subscription of your brokers' customers.

result.p: The details of the subscription are instantly displayed in the lower page area.
